channel.title: Tyler Gorrie-Stone's Website
channel.description: Recent content on Tyler Gorrie-Stone's Website

item.title: New Waters
item.description: After 5 years of being ‘active’ online as a respectable human being I believe that it is now the right time to start a blog and also flesh out what should be a serviceable website to advertise myself. I am not expecting to post daily but enough to document in an unofficial manner my opinions as I continue my career as a scientist and/or research software engineer. Anyway just a short post to test some stuff.

item.title: About
item.description: Welcome to my website! I am Tyler Gorrie-Stone. I currently work as a Research Software Engineer on i04-1 at Diamond Light Source. Previously I have worked as a Bioinformatician/Computational Biologist in epigenetics. I love working in R, getting pretty handy at Python and begrundingly have to use JavaScript sometimes (yuck!)

item.title: CV
item.description: Employment tbc Skills tbc Teaching Experience tbc Publications tbc References Available Upon Request

item.title: Projects
item.description: This page describes some of the projects I am currently working on and will be fleshed out in more details soon.
